description:
Powerful warmth in a light, packable layer, the Patagonia Down Vest is the modern standard for alpine missions and extreme weather anywhere. NetPlus® weather-resistant outer fabric, made from reclaimed fishing nets, is extremely light and has a good amount of abrasion resistance. The down is third-party certified to be non-live plucked and supplied from a facility that does not practice force feeding. Quilted construction keeps the down in place and the clean design is roomy enough to accommodate base layers.

  • Shell and lining are NetPlus® 100% postconsumer recycled nylon made from recycled fishing nets, helping to reduce ocean plastic pollution
  • Insulated with high-loft, premium, 800-fill-power Responsible Down Standard goose down
  • Sewn-through quilted construction
  • Full-length, lightweight Vislon zipper with internal storm flap and zipper garage
  • 2 zippered hand pockets
  • Internal pocket has a carabiner clip and doubles as the jacket's stuff sack
  • Nylon-bound elastic armholes seal in warmth
  • Drawcord hem adjusts from inside the handwarmer pockets
name: Patagonia Down Sweater Vest - Women's
